about_the_game:
Trekking Through Mountains and Rivers, Painting an Eastern Fantasy:

The game uses delicate hand-painted Chinese-style landscapes as its canvas, with layers of mist-shrouded peaks and babbling brooks reflecting ancient villages. Each frame resembles a flowing Eastern painting, guiding you into a poetic and fantastical world.

more Skills, Battle Passion Ignited:

From sharp archery to mysterious magic, to agile movement techniques, the protagonist masters a variety of skills. Players can freely combine these skills to face powerful enemies and bosses, experiencing the thrill of intense, fast-paced combat!

Calculating Every Move, Solving Intricate Puzzles:

The journey through mountains and rivers is filled with traps and mechanisms. Players must observe their surroundings, decipher mechanisms, and gather clues to unravel layered puzzles. Each step hides secrets, and every level tests your wit!

Collect and Explore, Discover Hidden Surprises:

Scattered throughout the game world are collectible items. Gathering them unlocks powerful new skills! Whether it's combat techniques to sweep through armies or devastating spells, they will help you conquer your adventure with ease!

short_description: This is an adventure through a landscape of mountains and waters. Amidst peaks and brooks, craft your legend. Traverse crags, cut through forests, explore ruins. Face strong foes, crack mechanisms, gather treasures. The path awaits!
